troparion: (Tone 8) In Your mercy, O Lord, come to our aid, * for our lives are full of sin and far from repentance. * We know no other but You * to rule over our life and our death. * O Lover of mankind, save us.
prokimenon: I love You, Lord, my strength,
my rock, my fortress, my Savior.
O God, You are the rock where I take refuge.
second_prokimenon: May the spoken words of my mouth, * and the thoughts of my heart,
win favour in Your sight, O Lord, my rescuer, my rock!
The heavens proclaim Your glory, O God, and the firmament shows forth the work of Your hands.
